com.nordicid.smartpair

Class SmartPairDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.smartpair.SmartPairDevice

  • public class SmartPairDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents smart pairing procedure device. This is passed to SmartPairListener onUpdate handler.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String addr
      Bluetooth address of the device.
      boolean connected
      true if fully connected to NurApi
      int connThreshold
      Connection threshold for this device in dBm
      int icon
      Resource ID of the device icon
      long lastSeen
      Last seen timestamp (System.currentTimeMillis) while scanning devices
      java.lang.String name
      Name of the bluetooth device
      static SmartPairDevice Null
      "null" or empty device instance.
      int type
      Type of the device.
